Class Task

java.lang.Object
Proiect.Task
public class Task extends Object
Task class, used to facilitate tasks for students or professors
Author:
Nevezi-Strango David

  • Constructor Details

    • Task

      public Task​(int senderID, int taskid, String title, int status, String subject, String deadline, String text) throws TaskException
      Constructor for the class Task
      Parameters:
      senderID - The ID of the task sender
      taskid - Task Identification Number
      title - Task's Title
      status - Task's Status
      text - Task's Text
      subject - Task's Subject
      deadline - Task's Deadline
      Throws:
      TaskException - Exception thrown when invalid title, text or deadline has been typed in
